renderpass.code: const float pi = 3.141592653589; float mmod(float a, float b) { return a - floor(a/b); } void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord ) { vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy; vec2 c1 = vec2(0.5,0.5); float n = 2.0*mmod(iTime,1.0); float a = cos(length(uv - c1) * 6.0 * n * 2.0 * pi) * sin(length(uv - c1) * 4.0 * (n+1.0) * 2.0 * pi); vec3 col = vec3(0,1,0) * a; fragColor = vec4(col,1.0); }
renderpass.name: Image
